programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Paul Walker and Vin Diesel. When illegal street racer Dominic Toretto is suspected of being the mastermind behind a series of truck hijacks, undercover police officer Brian O'Conner is sent to infiltrate his gang. But O'Conner's judgement becomes clouded when he falls in love with Toretto's sister, Mia Rob Cohen - Director Paul Walker - Brian Earl Spilner / Officer Brian O'Conner Vin Diesel - Dominic Toretto Michelle Rodriguez - Letty Jordana Brewster - Mia Toretto Rick Yune - Johnny Tran Chad Lindberg - Jesse Johnny Strong - Leon Ted Levine - Sgt Tanner Matt Schulze - Vince.

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Paul Walker. programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: Action thriller sequel starring Lucas Black. To avoid jail for illegal street racing, a bad-boy teenager is sent to Japan to stay with his estranged father. However, his discovery of drifting, a new style of racing reliant on the use of oversteering, soon gets him into more trouble Justin Lin - Director Lucas Black - Sean Boswell Brian Tee - DK Bow Wow - Twinkie Sung Kang - Han Nathalie Kelley - Neela Zachery Ty Bryan - Clay Caroline de Souza Correa - Isabella Keiko Kitagawa - Reiko Brian Goodman - Major Boswell Sonny Chiba - Uncle Kamata Vin Diesel - Dominic Toretto.

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: Action thriller in which Vin Diesel and Paul Walker, the stars of the first film in the street-racing franchise, team up again. Criminal Dominic Toretto returns to LA to avenge the murder of one of his friends by a drug kingpin, bringing him face to face with an old rival - FBI agent Brian O'Conner Justin Lin - Director Vin Diesel - Dominic Toretto Paul Walker - Brian O'Conner Michelle Rodriguez - Letty Jordana Brewster - Mia Toretto Laz Alonso - Fenix Gal Gadot - Gisele John Ortiz (1) - Campos Sung Kang - Han.

programme.title: The Hurricane Heist
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Maggie Grace and Toby Kebbell. With a category five hurricane bearing down on an Alabama town, an opportunistic group of crooks use the meteorological mayhem as cover for an audacious raid on a US Treasury facility. However, standing in the criminals' way are a maverick ATF agent and a stormchaser with a tragic past Rob Cohen - Director Maggie Grace - Casey Toby Kebbell - Will Ryan Kwanten - Breeze Ralph Ineson - Perkins Melissa Bolona - Sasha Ben Cross - Dixon Jamie Andrew Cutler - Clement Rice.

programme.title: The Great Escaper
programme.desc: Former Royal Navy officer Bernie Jordan is happily settled with wife Rene at a care home. Unfortunately, he hasn't secured a place on the official British Royal Legion trip to France to the commemorate the 70th anniversary of the D-Day landings. Bernie needs to make the trip to Normandy for personal reasons, and with Rene's blessing, he sneaks off to pay his respects. Drama, starring Michael Caine and Glenda Jackson in her final film Oliver Parker - Director Michael Caine - Bernie Jordan Glenda Jackson - Rene Jordan John Standing - Arthur Howard-Johnson Danielle Vitalis - Adele Victor Oshin - Scott Selwood Will Fletcher - Young Bernie.

programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Adam Driver and Penélope Cruz. Enzo Ferrari and his wife Laura have equal shares in their car-manufacturing company, but their marriage is in tatters following the death of their son, while the business is in financial peril. With the 1957 Mille Miglia endurance race looming, Enzo seeks victory for Ferrari, whatever the cost Michael Mann - Director Adam Driver - Enzo Ferrari Penélope Cruz - Laura Ferrari Shailene Woodley - Lina Lardi Sarah Gadon - Linda Christian Gabriel Leone - Alfonso de Portago Jack O'Connell - Peter Collins Patrick Dempsey - Piero Taruffi.

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.sub-title: Romance, Drama, Music, Musical, Arts And Culture ║ 2018 ║ 15
programme.desc: Musical romantic drama starring Lady Gaga and Bradley Cooper. Rock star Jackson Maine meets aspiring songwriter Ally, a waitress who moonlights as a bar singer. Mesmerised by Ally's talent, Jackson invites her to perform with him and she becomes a sensation. The two begin a romantic relationship, but their happiness is threatened as an increasingly washed-up Jackson grapples with substance abuse issues Bradley Cooper - Director Lady Gaga - Ally Bradley Cooper - Jackson Maine Andrew Dice Clay - Lorenzo Sam Elliott - Bobby Maine Rafi Gavron - Rez Anthony Ramos - Ramon Dave Chappelle - George \Noodles\ Stone Greg Grunberg - Phil, Jack's driver Michael Harney - Wolfie Ron Rifkin - Carl Barry \Shabaka\ Henley - Little Feet Eddie Griffin - Pastor Drena De Niro - Paulette Stone Alec Baldwin - Alec Baldwin.

programme.title: 8 Mile
programme.desc: Drama starring rap artist Eminem and Kim Basinger. Jimmy "Rabbit" Smith is stuck in a dead-end factory job in a tough area of Detroit where he lives with his highly strung mother and little sister. Jimmy longs to break out of this bleak existence by making it as a rapper, but his road to stardom is going to be a rocky one Curtis Hanson - Director Marshall Mathers - Jimmy \Rabbit\ Smith Kim Basinger - Stephanie Brittany Murphy - Alex Mekhi Phifer - Future Evan Jones - Cheddar Bob Omar Benson Miller - Sol George Eugene Byrd - Wink De'Angelo Wilson - DJ Iz.

programme.title: The Blind Side
programme.desc: Drama based on a true story, starring Oscar-winning Sandra Bullock. The life of homeless and largely abandoned African American teenager Michael Oher seems to be heading nowhere. That is until the intervention of wealthy white housewife Leigh Anne Tuohy, who takes Michael into her family home and helps him fulfil his potential - especially on the football field John Lee Hancock - Director Sandra Bullock - Leigh Anne Tuohy Tim McGraw - Sean Tuohy Quinton Aaron - Michael Oher Jae Head - S J Tuohy Lily Collins - Collins Tuohy Ray McKinnon - Coach Cotton Kim Dickens - Mrs Boswell Adriane Lenox - Denise Oher Kathy Bates - Miss Sue Catherine Dyer - Mrs Smith.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Tom Cruise, Cuba Gooding Jr and Renée Zellweger. As a top agent at Sports Management International, Jerry Maguire knows his way around and is his own man... until one day he gets an attack of decency and finds himself out of a job. Now he must start from scratch. His only allies are a single mother, her cheeky young son and a second-rate player for the Arizona Cardinals Cameron Crowe - Director Tom Cruise - Jerry Maguire Cuba Gooding Jr - Rod Tidwell Renée Zellweger - Dorothy Boyd Kelly Preston - Avery Bishop Jerry O'Connell - Frank Cushman Jay Mohr - Bob Sugar Bonnie Hunt - Laurel Boyd Regina King - Marcee Tidwell Jonathan Lipnicki - Ray Boyd Todd Louiso - Chad the nanny Eric Stoltz - Ethan Valhere.

programme.title: Lee
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Kate Winslet. As the Second World War rages, American fashion model-turned-photographer Elizabeth "Lee" Miller defies the expectations of the era and travels to mainland Europe as a war correspondent for Vogue. Reporting from the frontline, Miller captures indelible images of the conflict, including the horrors found in the Nazi concentration camps at Buchenwald and Dachau Ellen Kuras - Director Kate Winslet - Lee Miller Andy Samberg - Davy Scherman Alexander Skarsgård - Roland Penrose Marion Cotillard - Solange D'Ayen Andrea Riseborough - Audrey Withers Noémie Merlant - Nusch Eluard Josh O'Connor - Young Man / Antony Penrose James Murray - Colonel Spencer Arinzé Kene - Major Jonesy Vincent Colombe - Paul Eluard.

programme.title: The King's Speech
programme.desc: Oscar-winning historical drama starring Colin Firth, Helena Bonham Carter and Geoffrey Rush. As part of his royal duties, Prince Albert is required to speak at public events, a task made all the more difficult owing to his severe stammer. The death of his father and subsequent abdication of his older brother means that "Bertie" is to be crowned king. Unconventional speech therapist Lionel Logue is enlisted to help the future George VI find his voice - and despite Logue's disregard for all things stately, the two men form an unlikely bond Tom Hooper - Director Colin Firth - \Albert\, King George Vl Helena Bonham Carter - Queen Elizabeth Geoffrey Rush - Lionel Logue Guy Pearce - \David\, Edward Vlll Michael Gambon - King George V Timothy Spall - Winston Churchill Jennifer Ehle - Myrtle Logue Derek Jacobi - Archbishop Cosmo Lang Claire Bloom - Queen Mary Anthony Andrews - Stanley Baldwin Tim Downie - Duke of Gloucester Eve Best - Wallis Simpson Freya Wilson - Princess Elizabeth Ramona Marquez - Princess Margaret.

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Anthony Hopkins and Johnny Flynn. In 1938, young British stockbroker Nicholas Winton visits Prague and becomes involved in an audacious plan to evacuate hundreds of Jewish children before the Nazis close the borders. Decades later, Winton's records of the mission reawaken painful memories of the youngsters he couldn't save - and set him on an unexpected path to laying his ghosts to rest James Hawes - Director Anthony Hopkins - Nicholas Winton Helena Bonham Carter - Babette Winton Johnny Flynn - Nicholas, as a young man Lena Olin - Grete Winton Romola Garai - Doreen Warriner Jonathan Pryce - Martin Blake Ziggy Heath - Martin Blake, as a young man Adrian Rawlins - Geoff Samantha Spiro - Esther Rantzen Marthe Keller - Betty Maxwell Alex Sharp - Trevor.

programme.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind

programme.title: Six Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: In the summer of 1939, influential families in Nazi Germany send their daughters to a finishing school in an English seaside town to learn the language and be ambassadors for Hitler. A teacher sees what is coming and tries to raise the alarm, but the authorities believe he is the problem. programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Romance, Drama, Sci Fi, War ║ 2017 ║ 12
programme.desc: Fantasy action adventure starring Gal Gadot and Chris Pine. Young Diana has been raised a warrior on the secret island of Themyscira, shielded from the perils of the real world. When she rescues an American pilot whose plane crashes off the coast, Diana learns about the horrors of the First World War, and leaves the island with him to fight for peace and justice Patty Jenkins - Director Gal Gadot - Diana Prince / Wonder Woman Chris Pine - Steve Trevor Connie Nielsen - Queen Hippolyta Robin Wright - General Antiope Danny Huston - Ludendorff David Thewlis - Sir Patrick Elena Anaya - Dr Isabel Maru, \Dr Poison Lucy Davis - Etta Candy Ewen Bremner - Charlie Saïd Taghmaoui - Sameer Eugene Brave Rock - The Chief Florence Kasumba - Senator Acantha Eleanor Matsuura - Epione Lily Aspell - Diana, aged 8 Ann Ogbomo - Phillipus James Cosmo - Field Marshall Haig Wolf Kahler - German commander Martin Bishop - Kaiser Wilhelm II Rainer Bock - Von Hindenberg Josette Simon - Mnemosyne.

programme.title: The Portable Door
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Comedy, Mystery ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: Paul Carpenter and Sophie Pettingel are lowly interns who begin working at the mysterious London firm JW Wells & Co. Charismatic villains Humphrey Wells, the CEO of the company, and middle manager Dennis Tanner are disrupting the world of magic by bringing modern corporate strategy to ancient magical practices. Paul and Sophie eventually discover the true agenda of the vast corporation where they work. Fantasy adventure, starring Christoph Waltz and Sam Neill Jeffrey Walker - Director Christoph Waltz - Humphrey Wells Sam Neill - Dennis Tanner Patrick Gibson - Paul Carpenter Sophie Wilde - Sophie Pentigel Miranda Otto - Countess Judy Damon Herriman - Monty Smith-Gregg Jessica De Gouw - Rosie Tanner.

programme.title: IF
programme.sub-title: Fantasy, Drama, Animation, Comedy, Family, Children's ║ 2024 ║ U
programme.desc: Part-animated comedy fantasy starring Cailey Fleming and Ryan Reynolds. Staying with her grandmother while her father is in hospital, young Bea discovers that she can now see strange creatures - which turn out to be people's imaginary friends, or "IFs". When neighbour Cal explains that the IFs are lonely because their human friends have now grown up, Bea joins him in a quest to match the IFs with new companions John Krasinski - Director Cailey Fleming - Bea Ryan Reynolds - Cal John Krasinski - Bea's Dad / Marshmallow Phoebe Waller-Bridge - Blossom Louis Gossett Jr - Lewis Steve Carell - Blue Fiona Shaw - Grandmother Emily Blunt - Unicorn Matt Damon - Flower Maya Rudolph - Ally Jon Stewart - Robot Sam Rockwell - Guardian Dog Sebastian Maniscalco - Magician Mouse Christopher Meloni - Cosmo Richard Jenkins - Art Teacher Awkwafina - Bubble George Clooney - Spaceman Keegan-Michael Key - Slime Matthew Rhys - Ghost Bradley Cooper - Ice Blake Lively - Octopuss Amy Schumer - Gummy Bear.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire

programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Steve Martin and Goldie Hawn. Recently jilted architect Newton Davis's single fling with devil-may-care waitress Gwen has chaotic consequences. programme.title: The Independent
programme.desc: During the final weeks of the most consequential presidential election campaign in US history, America is poised to elect either its first female president or finally break the country's two-party gridlock with its first viable independent candidate. An idealistic young journalist gets an opportunity to work with her idol, veteran Washington political columnist Nick Booker. Eli is pursuing a story about budget cuts and by following the money, she and Booker uncover a financial conspiracy that places the fate of the election, the country, and democracy in their hands. programme.title: The Good Neighbour
programme.desc: A nightmarish evening unfolds for neighbours David and Robert when they accidentally hit a woman on her bike and flee the scene. While David is increasingly plagued by feelings of guilt, Robert shows no remorse and becomes overbearing and possessive. When David meets the victim's sister, he submits to a reckless passion and underlying sense of redemption, before realising Robert will do unspeakable things to protect their secret. Thriller, starring Jonathan Rhys Meyers and Luke Kleintank Stephan Rick - Director Jonathan Rhys Meyers - Robert Luke Kleintank - David Eloise Smyth - Vanessa Bruce Davison - Grant Ieva Florence - Janine.

programme.title: US Open: Draper v Machac
programme.desc: Jack Draper's bid for a first Grand Slam quarter-final sees the British number one challenge Tomas Machac. Draper has matched last year's fourth-round run at Flushing Meadows.

programme.title: US Open: Draper v De Minaur
programme.desc: In Jack Draper's first Grand Slam quarter-final, the 22-year-old British number one competes with Australia's Alex de Minaur, who is targeting a maiden major semi-final appearance.

programme.title: Serena v Hingis 1999
programme.desc: Twenty-two years before Emma Raducanu's triumph over Leylah Fernandez, Serena Williams and Martina Hingis locked horns in an all-teenage final at the 1999 US Open in the women's singles.

programme.title: Murray's Moments
programme.desc: Ranked number three in the world at the time, Andy Murray eyed his first clay-court title as the 27-year-old Scot fought Bavaria's own Philipp Kohlschreiber in the 2015 Munich final.

programme.title: Murray's Moments
programme.desc: With a second Wimbledon title and Olympic gold in Rio in the bank, Andy Murray capped 2016 by capturing world-number-one status after beating Novak Djokovic at the ATP World Tour Finals.

programme.title: Venus v Davenport 2000
programme.desc: The 2000 US Open women's singles final saw an all-American affair, as Venus Williams, making her fourth appearance here, met the world number one, Lindsay Davenport.

programme.title: ATP Final: Auckland
programme.desc: Gael Monfils becomes the second-oldest player to reach an ATP Tour final since 1990, as the 38-year-old Frenchman meets Belgian qualifier Zizou Bergs in Auckland at the ASB Classic. (11.01).

programme.title: ATP Finals 2024
programme.desc: A men's singles champion is crowned as world number one Jannik Sinner faces familiar foe American Taylor Fritz at the 2024 Nitto ATP Finals. (17.11).

programme.title: WTA Final: Adelaide
programme.desc: In an all-American final at the Adelaide International, Jessica Pegula and Madison Keys contest the third instalment of their rivalry, with the head-to-head record at one apiece. (11.01).

programme.title: ATP Final: Cordoba 2024
programme.desc: Luciano Darderi of Italy and Facundo Bagnis of Argentina compete for the men's singles crown at the ATP Tour's Cordoba Open. Both qualifiers seek a maiden tour-level title. (11.02).

programme.title: WTA Final: Abu Dhabi 2024
programme.desc: In the final of the Abu Dhabi Open, the top seed Elena Rybakina faces the number seven seed Daria Kasatkina. It took both players three sets to progress from Saturday's semi-finals. (11.02).

programme.title: Murray's Moments
programme.desc: 961 days and one new hip later, Andy Murray accomplished an incredible feat nine months after career-saving surgery by beating Stan Wawrinka in Antwerp to end a two-year wait for a title.

programme.title: Murray's Moments
programme.desc: At the 2023 US Open, 2012 champion Andy Murray fought his way to a 200th Grand Slam win by overcoming the flamboyant Frenchman Corentin Moutet in an entertaining straight-set victory.

programme.title: Serena v Azarenka 2013
programme.desc: In what was Serena Williams' fifth US Open victory and 17th Grand Slam title overall, the home favourite met Victoria Azarenka once more - the same player she beat the year previous.

programme.title: ATP Final: Adelaide
programme.desc: Number two seed Sebastian Korda of America stands between Felix Auger-Aliassime and a sixth tour-level title for the Canadian, as the two clash in the Adelaide International final. (11.01).

programme.title: WTA Final: Adelaide
programme.desc: In an all-American final at the Adelaide International, Jessica Pegula and Madison Keys contest the third instalment of their rivalry, with the head-to-head record at one apiece. (11.01).

programme.title: US Open: Draper v Sinner
programme.desc: Jack Draper's big moment arrives on Arthur Ashe Stadium as the British number one competes in his first Grand Slam semi-final against the world number one, Jannik Sinner of Italy.

programme.title: Jack Draper's US Open
programme.desc: Revisit the story of Jack Draper's breakthrough tournament at the 2024 US Open, as the rising British star went all the way to the men's singles semi-finals at the New York Grand Slam.

programme.title: Andy Murray: Grit, Glory & Legacy
programme.desc: Reflections on Sir Andy Murray's career - his determination, greatest achievements and the legacy he leaves - from stars including Navratilova, Henman, Draper, Raducanu and more.

programme.title: Murray vs The Big Three
programme.desc: Following Andy Murray's retirement, relive some of his best matches against tennis' Big Three. Featuring highlights from wins over Nadal in Madrid, Federer in Shanghai and Djokovic in Rome.

programme.title: ATP Tour This Week
programme.desc: Step behind the scenes of men's professional tennis throughout the 2025 season on the ATP Tour with special features, interviews and much more. Ep 2.

programme.desc: World number one Aryna Sabalenka looks to claim a second Brisbane International title, after success in 2023, against qualifier Polina Kudermetova. (05.01).

programme.desc: In an all-American final at the Adelaide International, Jessica Pegula and Madison Keys contest the third instalment of their rivalry, with the head-to-head record at one apiece. (11.01).

programme.title: WTA Final: Hobart
programme.desc: A two-time winner of the Hobart International, Elise Mertens returns to the final for a fourth time as the Belgian number two seed takes on the unseeded American McCartney Kessler. (11.01).

programme.title: ATP Final: Auckland
programme.desc: Gael Monfils becomes the second-oldest player to reach an ATP Tour final since 1990, as the 38-year-old Frenchman meets Belgian qualifier Zizou Bergs in Auckland at the ASB Classic. (11.01).

programme.title: Murray's Moments
programme.desc: In 2006 an unseeded 18-year-old Andy Murray defeated Australian Grand Slam champion Lleyton Hewitt in San Jose to win the first of his 46 ATP Tour titles.

programme.title: Murray's Moments
programme.desc: In his second year as a professional player, 19-year-old Andy Murray made his top-10 debut after an impressive run at Indian Wells in 2007, beating Tommy Haas in an epic quarter-final.

programme.title: Murray's Moments
programme.desc: Defeating career-rival Novak Djokovic for the second tournament in a row, revisit the moment Andy Murray won his first ATP Masters 1000 event at Cincinnati in 2008.

programme.title: Murray's Moments
programme.desc: Within striking distance of a first Grand Slam final, it would take a four-set battle for Andy Murray to achieve his dream as the young Scot overcame Rafael Nadal at the 2008 US Open.

programme.title: Murray's Moments
programme.desc: Aiming to emulate Andre Agassi in becoming the first player to defend the Toronto crown since 1995, Andy Murray would have to find a way past Roger Federer in a final for the first time.

programme.title: Murray's Moments
programme.desc: An extended look at Andy Murray's victory at the 2012 US Open. The Scot beat Novak Djokovic to become the first British man since Fred Perry in 1936 to win a Grand Slam singles title.

programme.title: US Open '24: Evans v Khachanov
programme.desc: Dan Evans' third-round run at the 2024 US Open began with an epic five-set thriller against Karen Khachanov, who two years prior, appeared in the semi-finals of the New York Slam.

programme.title: US Open '24: Paolini v Andreescu
programme.desc: Jasmine Paolini entered the 2024 US Open a Roland Garros and Wimbledon finalist in the same season, as the Italian got underway in New York against former champion Bianca Andreescu.

programme.title: US Open '24: Tiafoe v Shelton
programme.desc: During a memorable US Open run for Frances Tiafoe, the big-hitting American would reconvene with compatriot Ben Shelton in round three - a year on from their 2023 quarter-final meeting.

programme.title: US Open '24: Zheng v Vekic
programme.desc: During the 2024 US Open, Arthur Ashe Stadium was treated to an Olympic final rematch, as Qinwen Zheng and Donna Vekic went toe to toe at the last-16 stage of the New York Grand Slam.

programme.title: US Open '24: Dimitrov v Rublev
programme.desc: Without dropping a set, Grigor Dimitrov arrived at the last-16 of the 2024 US Open where the veteran Bulgarian would stand across the net from a sixth-seeded Andrey Rublev.

programme.title: US Open '24: Navarro v Gauff
programme.desc: In defence of her 2023 US Open women's singles crown, Coco Gauff was tasked with a last-16 match-up against an in-form Emma Navarro who had steamed through the earlier rounds.

programme.title: US Open '24: Fritz v Tiafoe
programme.desc: With the Arthur Ashe stage set, one man would realise the dream of a maiden Grand Slam final, as the American pair of Taylor Fritz and Frances Tiafoe clashed in the 2024 US Open semi-final.

programme.title: US Open '24: Pegula v Muchova
programme.desc: With a memorable win over the top seed under her belt, Jessica Pegula was a win away from a first Grand Slam final appearance as the American star fought Karolina Muchova at the US Open.

programme.title: US Open '24: Sinner v Fritz
programme.desc: In the men's singles final, Jannik Sinner stands in the way of Taylor Fritz and history, as the home hope looks to end a 21-year wait for an American man to win a Grand Slam title. (08.09).

programme.title: US Open '24: Sabalenka v Pegula
programme.desc: New York's own Jessica Pegula - competing in her first Grand Slam final - takes on last year's runner-up Aryna Sabalenka, as a first-time winner of the US Open is crowned on Ashe. (07.09).

programme.title: WTA Final: Linz 2024
programme.desc: In the final of WTA Linz, top seed Jelena Ostapenko faces the second seed Ekaterina Alexandrova. Ostapenko advanced with ease, while Alexandrova endured a three-hour semi-final. (04.02).

programme.title: ATP Final: Montpellier 2024
programme.desc: The Open Sud de France - Montpellier final pits the second seed and former champion Alexander Bublik up against Croatia's Borna Coric. Bublik is chasing a fourth tour-level trophy. (04.02).

programme.title: ATP Final: Cordoba 2024
programme.desc: Luciano Darderi of Italy and Facundo Bagnis of Argentina compete for the men's singles crown at the ATP Tour's Cordoba Open. Both qualifiers seek a maiden tour-level title. (11.02).

programme.title: WTA Final: Abu Dhabi 2024
programme.desc: In the final of the Abu Dhabi Open, the top seed Elena Rybakina faces the number seven seed Daria Kasatkina. It took both players three sets to progress from Saturday's semi-finals. (11.02).

programme.title: ATP Final: Marseille 2024
programme.desc: Targeting his second ATP Tour title this season, Grigor Dimitrov stars in the final of the Open 13 Provence against Ugo Humbert, who defeated the defending champion to get here. (11.02).

programme.title: WTA Final: Cluj 2024
programme.desc: After defeating Harriet Dart in straight sets, former Grand Slam finalist Karolina Pliskova sets up a decider with Romania's own Ana Bogdan in the final of the Transylvania Open. (11.02).

programme.title: ATP Final: Dallas 2024
programme.desc: A champion is crowned at the Dallas Open as Tommy Paul faces countryman Marcos Giron. Paul is aiming to add a second ATP title to his résumé after triumph in Stockholm back in 2021. (11.02).

programme.title: Hagler v Leonard 1987
programme.desc: Billed as The Super Fight, return to Caesars Palace to witness the undisputed middleweight champion Marvin Hagler collide with Sugar Ray Leonard.

programme.title: S/Lge 24': Wigan v St Helens Hlts
programme.desc: The Brick Community Stadium's derby day doubleheader concludes with a blockbuster clash between the table-topping champions, Wigan Warriors, and a third-placed Saints outfit. (12.07).

programme.title: SA20: Paarl R v Joburg SK
programme.desc: Paarl Royals and Joburg Super Kings compete in the SA20. (20.01).

programme.title: S/Lge 24': Wigan v St Helens Hlts
programme.desc: The Brick Community Stadium's derby day doubleheader concludes with a blockbuster clash between the table-topping champions, Wigan Warriors, and a third-placed Saints outfit. (12.07).

programme.title: S/Lge 24': Warrington v Leeds Hlts
programme.desc: After their eight-try victory over Huddersfield last time out, Warrington Wolves host a Leeds Rhinos side hunting for their third consecutive Betfred Super League victory. (11.07).

programme.title: S/Lge 24': St Helens v Leeds Hlts
programme.desc: St Helens host Leeds Rhinos in the Betfred Super League. The Saints were in rampant mood during round 11's clash with Castleford, pulling off an incredible 4-60 victory. (24.05).

programme.title: SA20: Durban's SG v Paarl R
programme.desc: In the SA20, Durban's Super Giants face Paarl Royals. (23.01).

programme.title: S/Lge 24: Leeds v Hull KR Hlts
programme.desc: Leeds Rhinos host Hull KR in the Betfred Super League. KR's Elliot Minchella sealed a 24-10 win over their city rivals in the Hull derby during round 17. (20.07).

programme.title: S/Lge 24: St Helens v W'ton Hlts
programme.desc: In the Betfred Super League, St Helens play host to a Warrington Wolves side riding a three-game winning streak. The Saints fell away from home to league leaders last week. (19.07).

programme.title: S/Lge 24: H'Field v Leeds Hlts
programme.desc: Huddersfield Giants take on Leeds Rhinos in the Betfred Super League. Luke Robinson guided his Giants team to victory for the first time as interim coach, overcoming Salford 16-8. (25.07).

programme.title: BBl: Knockout Hlts
programme.desc: Third meets fourth in the Big Bash League Knockout. In a win-or-go-home match, a place in the Challenger is at stake. (22.01).

programme.title: S/Lge 24': Wigan v H'field Hlts
programme.desc: Wigan Warriors host Huddersfield Giants in the Betfred Super League. For the first time since June 2023, the reigning champions Wigan have endured back-to-back defeats. (01.08).

programme.title: LIVE: ICC W-U19 T20 WC: A4 v D4
programme.desc: A fourth-place play-off at the 2025 ICC Women's Under-19 T20 World Cup at the Johor Cricket Academy Oval. (24.01).

programme.title: S/Lge 24': Wigan v H'field Hlts
programme.desc: Wigan Warriors host Huddersfield Giants in the Betfred Super League. For the first time since June 2023, the reigning champions Wigan have endured back-to-back defeats. (01.08).

programme.title: S/Lge 24': W'ton v Hull KR Hlts
programme.desc: The new league leaders Warrington Wolves host Hull KR in the Betfred Super League. Sam Burgess' Wolves emerged victorious in last week's colossal clash, defeating rivals Wigan. (02.08).

programme.title: NRLW Grand Final
programme.desc: A first Grand Final appearance since 2021 for the Sydney Roosters, as Sam Bremner and co come up against the Cronulla Sharks to conclude the 2024 Telstra Women's Premiership. (06.10).

programme.title: NRL Grand Final
programme.desc: An NRL Grand Final for the ages, as two of the very best battle it out for glory at Accor Stadium, where defending premiers Penrith face this term's minor premiers Melbourne Storm. (06.10).

programme.title: S/Lge 24':St Helens v Salford Hlts
programme.desc: St Helens play hosts to Salford Red Devils in the Betfred Super League. Paul Wellens' Saints finally ended their losing run with a healthy win at the MKM Stadium previously. (08.08).

programme.title: S/Lge 24': Leeds v Wigan Hlts
programme.desc: Leeds Rhinos play hosts to Wigan Warriors in the Betfred Super League. The champions Wigan converted their midweek game in hand into victory, subsequently returning to the summit. (10.08).

programme.title: S/Lge 24':Hull FC v London Hlts
programme.desc: Hull FC and London Broncos get Magic Weekend underway, marking the first of six Betfred Super League match-ups at Elland Road during round 22 of the season. (17.08).

programme.title: S/Lge 24': Wigan v St Helens Hlts
programme.desc: Wigan Warriors and St Helens are next to lock horns at Elland Road, as the pair collide during the second match of the Betfred Super League's annual Magic Weekend. (17.08).

programme.title: BBl: Knockout Hlts
programme.desc: Third meets fourth in the Big Bash League Knockout. In a win-or-go-home match, a place in the Challenger is at stake. (22.01).

programme.title: PGA Tour Champions Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights from the 2025 Mitsubishi Electric Championship at Hualalai, a PGA Tour Champions event kicking off the brand-new season. Steven Alker was the victor of this event a year ago.

programme.title: BBL Challenger
programme.desc: The loser of the Qualifier meets the winner of the Knockout in the Big Bash League Challenger. (24.01).

programme.desc: The undisputed super-bantamweight king Naoya Inoue defends his crown against Korean challenger Ye Joon Kim, who enters the Ariake Arena as a replacement for Sam Goodman. (24.01).

programme.desc: St Helens play hosts to Salford Red Devils in the Betfred Super League. Paul Wellens' Saints finally ended their losing run with a healthy win at the MKM Stadium previously. (08.08).

programme.title: LIVE: B'Liga: Wolfsburg v H. Kiel
programme.desc: Wolfsburg and Holstein Kiel meet in the German Bundesliga. (24.01).

programme.desc: Hull FC and London Broncos get Magic Weekend underway, marking the first of six Betfred Super League match-ups at Elland Road during round 22 of the season. (17.08).

programme.title: TRC Rnd 3: ARg v AUS
programme.desc: Los Pumas collide with the Wallabies in the third round of the 2024 Rugby Championship. Backrower Harry Wilson gets set to become the 90th player to lead Australia as captain. (31.08).

programme.title: S/Lge 24': Warrington v Leeds Hlts
programme.desc: It's Leeds Rhinos' time to step out onto the Elland Road turf as they challenge one of the Betfred Super League's standout performers this season, as Magic Weekend continues. (17.08).

programme.title: NFL DIV PO4: TBC @ TBC
programme.desc: Josh Allen and the Buffalo Bills face Lamar Jackson's Baltimore Ravens in the divisional round. The Bills haven't been to the Super Bowl since losing their fourth in a row in 1994. (19.01).

programme.title: NFL DIV PO1: TBC @ TBC

programme.title: Ras Al Kahimah 2023
programme.desc: The fourth and final day of the 2023 Ras Al Khaimah Championship at the Al Hamra Golf Club in the UAE. South Africa's Zander Lombard takes a one-shot lead into the final round (05.02).

programme.title: Nick Dougherty: Tee Time Tips
programme.desc: Nick Dougherty returns with another episode of Tee Time Tips.

programme.title: Nick Dougherty: Tee Time Tips
programme.desc: Sky Sports Golf pundit and former European Tour star Nick Dougherty provides a special set of Tee Time Tips from The 149th Open Championship at Royal St George's Golf Club, England.

programme.title: S/Lge 24': Leigh v Salford Hlts
programme.desc: Leigh Leopards join Salford Red Devils during the Betfred Super League's Magic Weekend - as Adrian Lam pits his side against Paul Rowley's at Elland Road. (18.08).

programme.title: S/Lge 24': Catlanas v Hull KR Hlts
programme.desc: In the penultimate match of the Betfred Super League's Magic Weekend at Elland Road, Catalans Dragons and Hull KR do battle. (18.08).

programme.title: S/Lge 24': H'Field v C'ford Hlts
programme.desc: Magic Weekend and round 22 of the 2024 Betfred Super League campaign concludes, as Huddersfield Giants and Castleford Tigers wrap proceedings up at Elland Road. (18.08).

programme.title: S/Lge 24': Leeds v Catalans Hlts
programme.desc: A contest from the 23rd round of the 2024 Betfred Super League season with top-six hopes at stake, as Leeds Rhinos host Catalans Dragons at AMT Headingley Stadium. (23.08).

programme.title: S/Lge: St Helens v Hull KR Hlts
programme.desc: In a huge game at the top of the table, fourth-placed St Helens host a table-topping Hull KR in the Betfred Super League. Willie Peters' side are now six games undefeated. (24.08).

programme.title: S/Lge 24': Hull KR v Salford Hlts
programme.desc: League leaders Hull KR, looking to make it eight wins from eight, host Salford in the Betfred Super League. The Robins have won their last six home meetings with the Red Devils. (30.08).

programme.title: S/Lge 24':Catalans v Wigan Hlts
programme.desc: A Grand Final rematch, as Catalans Dragons take on second-placed Wigan in the Betfred Super League. An inconsistent Catalans sit in sixth place with Leigh and Leeds close by. (31.08).
